hymn.title: Full Salvation
hymn.category: Assurance and Joy of Salvation—A Complete Work

layout.singingstanza: Full Sal -- va -- tion. Re -- demp -- tion's not the goal Full Sal -- va -- tion. In -- volves much more— Full Sal -- va -- tion. Is all a -- bout life spread -- ing— Fill -- ing ev -- ery part. Christ is— In me as my hope of— Glo -- ry— Won -- der -- ful! One day— This seed will ful -- ly blos -- som! I'll be glo -- ri -- fied!

lyrics.stanza: Full Salvation. Redemption's not the goal Full Salvation. Involves much more— Full Salvation. Is all about life spreading— Filling every part.
(The two parts can be sung simultaneously.)
